name: even
title: :even Selector
desc: Selects even elements, zero-indexed. See also odd.

examples.desc: Finds even table rows, matching the first, third and so on (index 0, 2, 4 etc.).
examples.html:
Row with Index #0
Row with Index #1
Row with Index #2
Row with Index #3

entries.longdesc: In particular, note that the 0-based indexing means that, counter-intuitively, :even selects the first element, third element, and so on within the matched set.
